name: bnomei/dotenv
description: Kirby 3 Plugin for environment variables from .env

scripts.dev-zip: rm kirby3-dotenv.zip; composer remove getkirby/cms; composer dumpautoload -o; composer archive --format=zip --file=kirby3-dotenv; composer require getkirby/cms:'dev-master as 3.0.0'; composer dumpautoload -o;
scripts.zip: rm kirby3-dotenv.zip; composer update; composer remove getkirby/cms; composer dumpautoload -o; zip -r kirby3-dotenv.zip . -x *.git*; composer require getkirby/cms:'dev-master as 3.0.0'; composer dumpautoload -o;
